exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params n : nat IHn : n <= div2 n + S (div2 n) Unable to unify "?M1663 <= S ?M1664" with "S n <= match n with | 0 => 0 | S n => S (div2 n) end + S match n with | 0 => 0 | S n => S (div2 n) end".

original: intros n. induction n. - simpl. apply Nat.le_0_l. - simpl. apply Nat.le_le_succ_r, IHn.
